sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: Major programs in kdeaccessibility include kmag, kmousetool and kmouth.

sect3.title: kmag
sect3.para: kmag is a screen magnifier for KDE.

sect3.title: kmousetool
sect3.para: kmousetool is a utility which clicks the mouse whenever the mouse cursor pauses briefly.

sect3.title: kmouth
sect3.para: kmouth is an application that enables persons that cannot speak to let their computers speak.
